title: Judgement Kayle
body: Hello, recently I was during with my friend, and he was playing Kayle and he had a skin called 'Judgement Kayle'. I've never seen that skin before and I think that skin is very cool. So I asked him on how he got it and he replied 'not sure maybe from the shop'. I checked the shop and it was not in the store. I then looked on google and it said it was given to season 1 players. So I would like to know is Judgement Kayle a really rare skin?

replies.body: I believe I got it from playing 10 ranked games in season 1
yes its very rare, you wont be able to get it by any means sorry
